data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ Repair Help: Learn How to Fix It Yourself.
data.meta_description: Find free step-by-step repair instructions, manuals, schematics, community support, and other DIY resources. You can do it! We show you how.
data.text:
The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ is Samsung's late-2015 flagship phone/tablet hybrid smartphone. It was unveiled at Samsung's Unpack event on August 13, 2015. The Edge+ offers faster wireless charging that supports both Qi and PMA standards, a 5.7-inch, dual-edge QuadHD AMOLED display, and 4 GB of RAM. In addition, the Edge+ has NFC and MST (magentic secure transmission) hardware to support SamsungPay.

Operating System: Android 5.1.1 "Lollipop"

Platform: Samsung Exynos 7 Octa 7420

CPU: Quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57

GPU: Mali-T760 MP8

RAM: 4 GB LPDDR4

Storage: 32 or 64 GB options

Display

Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors

2560×1440 pixels, 5.7-inches @ 518 ppi

Curved-edge screen protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 4

Camera

Main Camera

16 megapixel Samsung 1µm-pixel optical sensor

f/1.9

Video Recording: 2160p@30 fps, 1080p@60fps, 720p@120fps

Other : Auto HDR, optical image stabilization, Video Digital Image Stabilization, tracking autofocus, manual focus, LED flash

Front-Facing Camera

5 MP

Video Recording: 1440p@30fps

Other: dual video call, Auto HDR

Battery: Non-removable Li-Po 3000 mAh battery

Connectivity

USB: microUSB v2.0, USB Host

Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2.4 & 5GHz)

Bluetooth 4.2

4G/LTE

Sensors

Motion: Combination 6-axis Accelerometer and Gyro

Proximity

Compass

Barometer

Fingerprint reader

Navigation: GPS, GLONASS, BeiDou

Dimensions

Size: 154.4 mm x 75.8 mm x 6.9 mm

Mass: 153 g
